articles.title: I've kept my HIV diagnosis and sexuality a secret from my family for 9 years. Here's why - AsiaOne
articles.description: Dec 1 marks World Aids Day, which is dedicated to raising awareness on acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (Aids) and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).This year, the Joint United Nations Programme on HIV and Aids has adopted the tagline "End inequalities. En…

articles.title: Singapore overtakes Hong Kong as most expensive place to live in Asia - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The Economist Intelligence Unit Worldwide Cost of Living 2021 report put Tel Aviv in top spot, with Singapore and Paris in joint second place and Hong Kong ranked fifth.

articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks bounce as investors assess omicron Covid variant concerns; oil prices jump nearly 4% - CNBC
articles.description: Major markets across Asia-Pacific bounced back on Wednesday, with South Korean stocks leading gains regionally.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Major markets across Asia-Pacific bounced back on Wednesday, following losses the day before that were triggered by renewed uncertainty on the omicron Covid variant.
